To reproduce the error, just open an new VisualClass, add a Button and change
the buttontext.
Is this still a problem on the latest build

Moving to 1.2 due to lack of runway for 1.1. Please check with the latest builds
to see if problem is still occuring.
Please try this with the released code of VE 1.1 and let us know the results.
Please reopen the defect if it occurs in latest builds.
